alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 12 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Wyoming, including the following areas, Central Carbon County, North Snowy Range Foothills, Sierra Madre Range, Snowy Range, Southwest Carbon County and Upper North Platte River Basin. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of heavy rain and thunderstorms expected across the watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
